title: National Archives Confirms Trump Had Classified Material at Mar-a-Lago
sub_head: Agency told Congress it had informed the Justice Department the material included classified documents
body:
WASHINGTONâ€”Former President Donald Trump had classified government records at his Florida residence, the National Archives and Records Administration informed a congressional panel Friday, saying it was in communication with the Justice Department on the matter.
In January, the National Archives retrieved 15 boxes of material from Mr. Trump, raising questions about his compliance with federal law requiring official records to be turned over when a president leaves office.
